oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baker, Henry; and wife Louise S. Baker, 1894, 1909
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Henry Baker, “of the County of Davidson, State of Tennessee,” dated September 26th, 1893, that was probated in the Davidson County Court on April 12th, 1894, recorded in “Will Book 32, Page 313.” Illustrates the first page of the document. Includes the will of his wife Louise S. Baker, dated August 9th, 1909. Her will was probated in the Davidson County Court on February 13th, 1909. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baker family
